title: MY ACCOUNT WAS HACKED HELP ME PLS
body:
i gave a code to a friend in my list iam so dumb he changed my login datas and i cant log in any more pls help me and ban this account 
iam writing from the account of my brother my account is StrateAFK 
pls help me i want my account back!

replies.body: Aw man that's no good! Remember to keep your password and login name safe, but let's go ahead and get you in touch with our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to start the recovery process.
